title: Notwithstanding the provisions of sub-regulations (2) of this Regulation, the minimum open spaces in
clause_text: Notwithstanding the provisions of sub-regulations (2) of this Regulation, the minimum open spaces in plots in residential and commercial zones may be relaxed to the values quoted in Table No 17 below, if the number of storeysare restricted to Ground and one upper floor or Stilt and two upper floors Provisions in Open Spaces for Plots in Residential and Commercial Zones
section: Provisions in marginal open spaces if the height of the building is restricted-
